snippet: Lazio left back Senad Lulic has been banned for 20 days after he said AS Roma defender Antonio Ruediger was selling socks and belts two years ago....
lead_paragraph: Lazio left back Senad Lulic has been banned for 20 days after he said AS Roma defender Antonio Ruediger was selling socks and belts two years ago.

headline.main: Lulic Handed 20-Day Ban for Ruediger Comments
headline.print_headline: Lulic Handed 20-Day Ban for Ruediger Comments
